channel.title: Rsc Dedication - Website now up
channel.description:
[b][i]So here we are my fellow runescapers, Im here to happily tell you that i will be launching a RSC private server, my focuses will be pking and skilling and i will also support many other events, there is a large list of features already in place and they are constantly being updated daily.[/i][/b]
I am excited to announce that we will have a subscription system. Im even happier to announce that i do not want your money for subscriptions. i will be implementing a Item Drop Like subscription Certificates, at a set amount you will get to sub.
[b][i]If your worried about a server that might not be around in a few years stop there. I have been playing runescape for many many years and have stayed true to Rsc. Find your home here with protected character logs so you will never lose your accounts and items. [/i][/b] What are you waiting for Jump on and sign in and check out some of the cool features already added! [i][b]Sign up on the forum and start playing![/b][/i] www.rscdedication.com/forum Server Rates are 8x-16x Original Rsc XP Double Xp Events on weekends right now Fresh economy. Not many rune items yet. The only way to get dragon and rune is KBD and Red Dragon's Untill someone is 99 smithing. I will be hosting a few events for rares to put them in the economy and im working on replicating the original holiday drops.
*Slayer skill* *Castle Wars* Batched Skills! MORE QUESTS COMING
Rsc Dedication staff, www.RscDedication.com
[b][u]Commands[/u][/b]
::onlinelist ::skull ::fatigue ::noloot to disable or enable dropped items ::say to message everyone ::stuck f2 for menu F3 FOR SLAYER MENU ::MENU TO TOGGLE no roof, change password etc
[url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=10&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/710.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=11&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/66610.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=12&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/screen11.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=14&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/screen13.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=15&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/810.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=16&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/screen14.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=17&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/screen15.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=18&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/screen16.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=19&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/screen17.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=20&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/screen18.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=21&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/screen19.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=22&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/screen20.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=24&u=18768636][img]http://i55.servimg.com/u/f55/18/76/86/36/44411.png[/img][/url]

item.title: Rsc Dedication - Website now up
item.dc:creator: @burger1990 burger1990
item.description:
@burger1990 wrote:

i love this server! I encourage everyone that is getting bored with the RSC servers they’ve been playing to hop on and take advantage of the early stages of this client! Kuhn (our admin/owner) has a 1 year contract for this server so its garunteed to be up! get a head start on the server that is going to stick around for awhile! www.rscdedication.com

add me in game and ill help get you started! “Burger”

-Burger

Read full topic

item.title: Rsc Dedication - Website now up
item.dc:creator: @potential_kilo potential kilo
item.description:
@potential_kilo wrote:

good luck with this project, but honestly i would work on a high scores… if you cant have those then people lose interest because rsc is very competitive.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsc Dedication - Website now up
item.dc:creator: @agent_evo agent evo
item.description:
@agent_evo wrote:

when i try to open the client it closes on me… whats up with that?

Read full topic

item.title: Rsc Dedication - Website now up
item.dc:creator: @g0nef1shin g0nef1shin
item.description:
@g0nef1shin wrote:

[quote=“sklem, post:2, topic:540864”]So, first I tried to create account with my usual private server name, but it was taken. Well I don’t mind it isn’t that special either but there are like 7 or 8 members and I didn’t see that name there. Ok, lets create another acc. The 2nd try was successful, even activated the account. Then after browsing forums for 1-2 mins I got banned… All I did was that I opened some threads with information from 2013 november-december?

Anyways I gave up.[/quote]

Sorry for the inconvenience, this was fixed. happy to see you got in ok We had 10 on last night playing. lots of people getting a head start on those skills!

Regards,

Rsc Dedication Staff

Read full topic

item.title: Rsc Dedication - Website now up
item.dc:creator: @sklem sklem
item.description:
@sklem wrote:

So, first I tried to create account with my usual private server name, but it was taken. Well I don’t mind it isn’t that special either but there are like 7 or 8 members and I didn’t see that name there. Ok, lets create another acc. The 2nd try was successful, even activated the account. Then after browsing forums for 1-2 mins I got banned… All I did was that I opened some threads with information from 2013 november-december?

Anyways I gave up.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsc Dedication - Website now up
item.dc:creator: @g0nef1shin g0nef1shin
item.description:
@g0nef1shin wrote:

So here we are my fellow runescapers, Im here to happily tell you that i will be launching a RSC private server, my focuses will be pking and skilling and i will also support many other events, there is a large list of features already in place and they are constantly being updated daily.

I am excited to announce that we will have a subscription system. Im even happier to announce that i do not want your money for subscriptions. i will be implementing a Item Drop Like subscription Certificates, at a set amount you will get to sub.

If your worried about a server that might not be around in a few years stop there.
I have been playing runescape for many many years and have stayed true to Rsc. Find your home here with protected character logs so you will never lose your accounts and items.

What are you waiting for Jump on and sign in and check out some of the cool features already added!
Sign up on the forum and start playing! www.rscdedication.com/forum
Server Rates are 8x-16x Original Rsc XP
Double Xp Events on weekends right now
Fresh economy. Not many rune items yet.
The only way to get dragon and rune is KBD and Red Dragon’s Untill someone is 99 smithing.
I will be hosting a few events for rares to put them in the economy and im working on replicating the original holiday drops.

Slayer skill
Castle Wars
Batched Skills!
MORE QUESTS COMING

Rsc Dedication staff,
www.RscDedication.com

Commands

::onlinelist
::skull
::fatigue
::noloot to disable or enable dropped items
::say to message everyone
::stuck
f2 for menu
F3 FOR SLAYER MENU
::MENU TO TOGGLE no roof, change password etc
